content.rendered:
Directed by M.D. Sridhar

Written by Gautam Siddharth

Cast Darshan Thoogudeep (Gajendra Narayana Varma). Sanah Thimmayyah (Shakambari). Devaraj (Shakambari’s father). P. Ravi Shankar (Gangster Son). Sharath Lohitashwa (Local gangster). Chikkanna (Gajendra’s lawyer cousin) . Sadhu Kokila (Parandhama). Pankaj Narayan (Gajendra’s brother). Prashanth Natana (Police officer). Yashas Surya (Gajendra’s brother #2)

Languages Kannada

Production Sandesh Production. Goldmines Telefilm
